info.description: Pulsar is an incident management and alerting platform. This API provides endpoints for managing alerts, incidents, teams, schedules, escalation policies, notifications, and webhooks.
info.title: Pulsar API

get.description: List alerts with optional filters

post.description: Create a new alert in the organization

get.description: Get an alert by ID

post.description: Acknowledge an alert by ID
Assign an alert to a user or team
Close an alert by ID with a reason
Snooze an alert until a specified time
Authenticate a user and return tokens
Logout the current user (client should discard tokens)

get.description: Get the currently authenticated user's information

post.description: Get a new access token using a refresh token
Register a new user with an organization

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of escalation policies for the authenticated user's organization

post.description: Creates a new escalation policy for the authenticated user's organization

get.description: Retrieves a specific escalation policy by ID with its rules and targets

delete.description: Deletes an escalation policy by ID

patch.description: Updates an existing escalation policy by ID

get.description: Retrieves all escalation rules for a specific policy

post.description: Creates a new escalation rule for a specific policy

get.description: Retrieves a specific escalation rule by ID

delete.description: Deletes an escalation rule by ID

patch.description: Updates an existing escalation rule by ID

get.description: Retrieves all escalation targets for a specific rule

post.description: Adds a new target (user, team, or schedule) to an escalation rule

delete.description: Removes a target from an escalation rule

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of incidents with optional filtering by status, severity, team, and search term

parameters.description: Filter by status (investigating, identified, monitoring, resolved)
parameters.name: status

parameters.description: Filter by severity (critical, high, medium, low)
parameters.name: severity

parameters.description: Search term for title and description
parameters.name: search

post.description: Creates a new incident with the provided details. The incident is created in the investigating status.

get.description: Retrieves an incident with all related data including responders, alerts, and timeline events
get.summary: Get an incident with full details

delete.description: Permanently deletes an incident and all associated data

patch.description: Updates an existing incident with the provided fields. Only fields included in the request body will be updated.

get.description: Retrieves all alerts that are associated with an incident
get.summary: List alerts linked to an incident

post.description: Associates an existing alert with an incident for tracking and correlation
post.summary: Link an alert to an incident

delete.description: Removes the association between an alert and an incident
delete.summary: Unlink an alert from an incident

post.description: Adds a note to the incident timeline as a timeline event
post.summary: Add a note to an incident

get.description: Retrieves all responders assigned to an incident with their user details

post.description: Assigns a user as a responder to an incident with a specific role
post.summary: Add a responder to an incident

delete.description: Removes a user from the list of responders for an incident
delete.summary: Remove a responder from an incident

patch.description: Updates the role of a responder assigned to an incident

get.description: Retrieves all timeline events for an incident including status changes, notes, and responder actions
Lists all notification channels for the organization

post.description: Creates a new notification channel for the organization

get.description: Retrieves a notification channel by its ID

delete.description: Deletes a notification channel by its ID

patch.description: Updates an existing notification channel by its ID

get.description: Lists all notification logs for the organization with pagination
Lists all notification logs associated with a specific alert
Lists all notification logs for the authenticated user with pagination
get.summary: List notification logs for the current user

get.description: Retrieves a notification log entry by its ID
Lists all notification preferences for the authenticated user

post.description: Creates a new notification preference for the authenticated user

get.description: Retrieves a notification preference by its ID

delete.description: Deletes a notification preference by its ID

patch.description: Updates an existing notification preference by its ID

post.description: Sends a notification through the specified channel

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of schedules for the current organization

post.description: Creates a new schedule for the current organization

get.description: Retrieves a schedule by ID including its rotations

patch.description: Updates an existing schedule by ID

get.description: Retrieves the user currently on-call for a schedule at a specific time
Retrieves all overrides for a schedule within a time range

post.description: Creates a new schedule override

get.description: Retrieves an override by ID

patch.description: Updates an existing override by ID

get.description: Retrieves all rotations for a schedule

post.description: Creates a new rotation for a schedule

get.description: Retrieves a rotation by ID

patch.description: Updates an existing rotation by ID

get.description: Retrieves all participants for a rotation

post.description: Adds a participant to a rotation

delete.description: Removes a participant from a rotation

get.description: List all teams in the organization

post.description: Create a new team in the organization

get.description: Get a team by ID with its members
List all members of a team

post.description: Add a user as a member to a team
post.summary: Add a member to a team

delete.description: Remove a user from a team
delete.summary: Remove a member from a team

patch.description: Update the role of a team member

get.description: List all users in the organization
List all webhook delivery attempts for the organization
List all outgoing webhook endpoints for the organization

post.description: Create a new outgoing webhook endpoint

get.description: Get a webhook endpoint by ID

delete.description: Delete a webhook endpoint by ID

patch.description: Update a webhook endpoint by ID

get.description: List all incoming webhook tokens for the organization

post.description: Create a new incoming webhook token for receiving webhooks from external sources

delete.description: Delete an incoming webhook token by ID

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token.
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
